DOC.brief_summary: Investigate effect stretch muscle rib cage individual COPD exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects Stretching Program Rib Cage Muscles Patients With COPD During Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: To investigate effect stretch program muscle rib cage control patient COPD exercise / immediate post-exercise , use follow parameter : - Tidal volume ( VT ) , respiratory rate ( RR ) , minute volume ( MV ) , inspiratory time ( Tins ) expiratory ( T exp ) . - Change volume total regional chest magazine ( pulmonary rib cage , abdominal rib cage abdomen ) . - Diaphragmatic mobility . - electrical muscle activity - endurance time . - Dyspnea sensation .
DOC.criteria: Smoking history , occupational environmental exposure pollutant / symptom cough , dyspnea hypersecretion ; FEV1 < 80 % predict postbronchodilator FEV1 / FVC < 70 % confirm diagnosis airway obstruction fully reversible bronchodilator therapy ; Absence comorbidities allow realization stress ( hypertension , severe pulmonary hypertension , myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure , severe dyspnoea ) ; Preserved cognitive functioning ; Sedentary Clinically stable study period . Patients cognitive , hear visual deficit ; Changes neuromusculoskeletal system endangers impair assessment ; Obese Not able achieve least three stage incremental test .
